words.definition: Jīn tiān tiān qì hěn hǎo. - The weather is very good today.
Wǒ xiǎng qù tú shū guǎn kàn shū. - I want to go to the library to read books.
Nǐ huì shuō zhōng wén ma? - Can you speak Chinese?
Zhè ge píng guǒ hěn hǎo chī. - This apple is very delicious.
Xiè xie nǐ de bāng zhù. - Thank you for your help.
